entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [ManualMauiTests] Editor font attributes do not seem to take affect #17785
  • [ManualMauiTests] <Keyboard> on Editor does not appear to have any effect #17784
  • [ManualMauiTests] Pasting long text when the editor has a max length does nothing #17783
  • [ManualMauiTests] New text in the Editor character spacing test sometimes uses the previous spacing #17782
  • [Recipes] The cancel/clear search button does not disappear #17781
  • InputView MaxLengthProperty appears to be declared incorrectly #17780
  • [Android] ToShortTimeString() missing space between time and AM/PM on API 34 #17779
  • Calling SetBinding after setting a constant value crashes #17776
    .NET 8 GA
  • Crash when changing mainpage #17769
  • Clicking Editor in iOS creates an abnormal/undesirable "Done" bar above Touch Screen Keyboard, while clicking Entry does not cause this (correct function) #17768

Closed

  • NRE in HideSoftInputOnTappedChangedManager.UpdateFocusForView #17681
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Maui WebAuthenticator returns back from apple signin: An error was encountered while handling the remote login #17585
  • Can build full screen apps in Windows/Android easily but no method for iOS works #17767

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [net8.0] Merge main net8 #17777
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17773
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17772
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Make ALL template warnings show up as test errors (not just C# warnings), and produce more diagnostic artifacts #17637
    area/templates 📄
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2] Update dependecies for RC2 #17743
  • dependabot group fix for Android ecosystem - added missing prefixes #17770
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17749
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Don't run hide on tapped code if window is null #17758
    platform/android 🤖, area/keyboard

Updated

  • Fix some of the false GC test failures in Debug mode #17596
  • Make sure to account for a null AppWindow #17746
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Run template tests run in parallel to save 15min of run time #17672
    do-not-merge, area/templates 📄
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (1) #17669
    community ✨
  • Correctly expand rows/columns when grid padding #17750
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • Fixed Path size calculations #17722
    area/drawing ✏️, do-not-merge
  • Improves performance on SetterSpecificity and SetterSpecificityList #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
